meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively eager to please or obey.
meanings.sent1: Her obsequiousnesses towards the teacher were obvious to everyone in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The waiter's obsequiousnesses towards the customers were appreciated by the restaurant owner.
meanings.sent3: The dog's obsequiousnesses towards its owner made everyone laugh at the park.
meanings.sent4: The politician's obsequiousnesses towards the wealthy donors were as transparent as glass.
meanings.sent5: The obsequiousnesses of the employee towards the boss were like a bright neon sign.

meanings.definition: An instance of showing excessive eagerness to please or obey.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, there were multiple obsequiousnesses from the new intern.
meanings.sent2: The obsequiousnesses of the student towards the teacher were met with suspicion.
meanings.sent3: The cat's obsequiousnesses towards the mouse were comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The obsequiousnesses of the wind towards the trees were gentle and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The obsequiousnesses of the child towards the grandparent were heartwarming.
